new.description: Exploit for Apache Tomcat deserialization (CVE-2020-9484) which could lead to RCE

new.name: CVE-2020-9484-Scanner
new.description: A smol bash script I threw together pretty quickly to scan for vulnerable versions of the Apache Tomcat RCE. I'll give it some love when I have the time.

new.name: CVE-2020-9484-Mass-Scan
new.description: CVE-2020-9484 Mass Scanner, Scan a list of urls for Apache Tomcat deserialization (CVE-2020-9484) which could lead to RCE

new.name: CVE-2020-9484
new.description: 用Kali 2.0复现Apache Tomcat Session反序列化代码执行漏洞

new.name: tomcat-cluster-session-sync-exp
new.description: tomcat使用了自带session同步功能时，不安全的配置（没有使用EncryptInterceptor）导致存在的反序列化漏洞，通过精心构造的数据包， 可以对使用了tomcat自带session同步功能的服务器进行攻击。PS:这个不是CVE-2020-9484，9484是session持久化的洞，这个是session集群同步的洞！

update.name: Serein
update.description: 【懒人神器】一款图形化、批量采集url、批量对采集的url进行各种nday检测的工具。可用于src挖掘、cnvd挖掘、0day利用、打造自己的武器库等场景。可以批量利用Actively Exploited Atlassian Confluence 0Day CVE-2022-26134和DedeCMS v5.7.87 SQL注入 CVE-2022-23337。

update.name: Serein_Linux
update.description: 【Lazy Artifact】A graphical tool that collects urls in batches, and performs various nday detections on the collected urls in batches. It can be used for src mining, cnvd mining, 0day exploitation, building your own arsenal and other scenarios.
